p: A principal component analysis (PCA) performed on a combined data matrix gathering percentages of 64 compounds for O. ehrenbergii EOs from Aaqoura, Faraya, Baskinta, Barouk, and Choueir Bolonia, as well as our own results from Qartaba and Aabadiye, extracted 94.88% of the total variance in PC1 and PC2. Figure 12 presents a biplot of PC1-PC2 scores and loadings, where a clear separation between the samples from Qartaba, Aabadiye, and Aaqoura and those from Faraya, Baskinta, Barouk, and Choueir Bolonia is visible along PC2.
